subject: Archive the plan
description: To be completed after all other tasks are done. Create a folder named `add-managed-files-list-to-claude-md` in `./plans/completed`. Move the plan into `./plans/completed/add-managed-files-list-to-claude-md/`. Read the session IDs from the plan file. For each session ID, move the `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` directory to `./plans/completed/add-managed-files-list-to-claude-md/tasks`.
